channel.title: Epsilion server development project!
channel.description:
NO WHALES WERE HARMED IN THE MAKING OF THIS!... WELL MAYBE A FEW IDK.
Well first of, i just wanna tell you guys that this is my first source i have ever coded and id like it if i didnt get flamed, but i do like the constructive critisism, just no need for the hateful words :p ok lets get down to bussiness
Features- full PvP with timers and you get 1 random item every few kills full gs stance and specs full d claws spec and models New home Donator zone, cape and armor herblore and farming added new skiller area Fully working godwars with killcount and drops a pvp kills ranking system all skillcapes trimmed and non quest cape gfx :D kbd and chaos ele and alot of commands lol custom clan wars and clan chat!
Ok time for sexy pictures (not in that way you assholes!) full claws spec [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/zkrew3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/28ku1cz.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2yv8nz6.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/1zl7rqf.jpg[/img]
gs stance [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/s5uzhf.jpg[/img]
ags spec [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/x2760x.jpg[/img]
home [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2e0sl6g.jpg[/img]
home altars [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/28sn1om.jpg[/img]
chaos ele [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/rumtc7.jpg[/img]
CUSTOM CLAN WARS! [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/21jp30l.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/11c82yu.jpg[/img]
donator zone [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2ib1e2p.jpg[/img] donator armor and cape [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/25g5lqh.jpg[/img]
godwars [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2q1z4b9.jpg[/img] My bandos pic got deleted :/ sorry
KBD [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/1192bt1.jpg[/img]
PVP shop [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/ip9yj7.jpg[/img]
omfg spec quest cape gfx [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/nffckp.jpg[/img]
shops :) [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/5pmpe1.jpg[/img]
skilling area [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2nkqw6h.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/303d6ok.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/t8nrcw.jpg[/img]
PLEASE LEAVE A POST SAYING IF I SHOULD MAKE A V2 or just release this one for downloads. Thanks - Nick
Credits to- Demise Delta Me Vwj for all the help myles for the support and the whales that i killed for their money, oh shit wasnt supposed to tell you that!

NO WHALES WERE HARMED IN THE MAKING OF THIS!.. WELL MAYBE A FEW IDK.

Well first of, i just wanna tell you guys that this is my first source i have ever coded and id like it if i didnt get flamed, but i do like the constructive critisism, just no need for the hateful words ok lets get down to bussiness

and clan chat!
